data.name: DinoLife
data.detailed_description:
DinoLife is a Life simulator game with Idle game elements, the aim is to obtain, hatch and look after many dinosaurs in order to make money and buy more objects for your player house.

The game starts with you the player having just moved to a new town however you have an old best friend who moved there a few years back who can show you around and get you started on your journey.

What's the journey, to make money of course but during the journey you can buy many things, from trinkets and Dinosaur eggs to houses and milk. All while having the coolest farm possible, a Dinosaur farm.

Features
  • Collect, hatch and earn money from different dinosaurs.
  • Attempt to hatch the most appealing dinosaurs to earn more money.
  • Feed your dinos.
  • Complete missions and interact with NPCs.
  • Buy items to place within your house and even save to buy your own house.

data.short_description: DinoLife is a Life simulator game with Idle game elements, the aim is to obtain, hatch and look after many dinosaurs in order to make money and buy more objects for your player house.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 11
